entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning late in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres late in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
